predicate.note: Frames file for 'rectify' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry.

example.name: active
example.text: The proposed legislation is aimed at *trace* rectifying some of the inequities in the current land-ownership system.
example.arg: some of the inequities in the current land-ownership system

example.name: passive
example.text: He described the situation as ``an escrow problem, a timing issue,'' which he said was rapidly rectified *trace*, with no losses to customers.
example.arg: *trace* -> *trace* -> which -> an escrow problem, a timing issue
